name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee brewed by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee drink that is composed of espresso and steamed milk, with a layer of frothed milk on top.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk. It's often topped with a small amount of milk foam.

name: Mocha
description: A coffee drink that combines espresso with hot milk and cocoa powder, often topped with whipped cream.

name: Iced Americano
description: A refreshing coffee drink made by diluting espresso with cold water and served over ice.

name: Caramel Macchiato
description: An espresso-based coffee with steamed milk, vanilla syrup, and caramel drizzle.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice cubes, often sweetened and flavored.

name: Flat White
description: An espresso-based coffee originating from Australia, made with microfoam steamed milk.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional method of brewing coffee that involves finely ground coffee beans boiled in a pot with water and sugar.
